title: Urgot is being neglected...
body: I'm a bit tired of this riot games. Urgot has been well over do for literally anything. It does not have to be a a major rework, but just a few minor kit changes would be glorious. His ult has literally no use at all so if you changed his ult to work more for his Q that would be magnificent! Make him a machine gun turret like Kog used to be. Also the last Urgot skin we got was Battlecast which is around 2-3 years ago... Please do something with this champion. This goes for Galio too!

replies.body: Well Urgot's ult does have a use, it's just very niche and doesn't fit with the marksmen playstyle.
Everything that has been stated in the post and the comments I have seen dozens of times. The faces change but the words never change is what the Urgot mains sees.

Urgot is actually a lot more strong/popular than people seem to think (on and off, he has his moments), but he never seems to show up in very low elo games, or become widely popular (big surprise?). He actually has a pretty solid winrate, although that may be influenced by his 0.3% pickrate.
His EQ combo is still pretty toxic, so I wouldn't want to ask for a single buff til his rework kicks in.

Galio is decent, just his Ult is all of his Kit.

Urgot top is a pain, for melee tops because of the constant harass.

Aatrox is like a shitty Yi, 1 Leap and 1 slow with that W.

So to be clear. I like the idea of him as a lane bully and that's how i think he should stay. However, his ult is just not a proper fit to his play style. He's not a tank and he is not an ADC more of a weird bruiser but at the same time not. He is just in a weird undefined spot so I would like to see him placed in a more clear spot or position. Thanks for all the comments :)
since when was urgot weak? also hes not really an adc more like a ranged lane bully
